CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 9, 1945, pg. 26 reads: "Two Years Old - little Audrey Ann Ficklin, youngest daughter of the Thomas R. Ficklins, of 268 Paulson Avenue, recently celebrated her second birthday. Attending the merry celebration were, front row, left to right :Beverlly Hamilton, Barbara Ficklin, Audrey to right: Beverly Ham...William Paige II. Back row:...Pinkett and Frances M...shown in picture...Harris PHoto."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of three boys, and eight girls, including in first row: Beverly Hamilton, Barbara Ficklin, Audrey Ann Ficklin standing at birthday cake with two candles, and William Paige II at end, gathered in home of Thomas R. Ficklin and family, 268 Paulson Avenue
